SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.jmesa.util
Class SupportUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.jmesa.util.SupportUtils

public class SupportUtils
extends Object

Utility to first check to see if the object being inspected is an instance of the support class. If it is then will do a check to see if the object to be injected is already set. If it is not then it will be injected.

Since:
2.2
Author:
Jeff Johnston
